solution_line_template: The total revenue from black shirts was {black_shirts_count} * ${black_shirt_cost} = $<<{black_shirts_count}*{black_shirt_cost}={revenue_black_shirts}>>{revenue_black_shirts}.
The total revenue from white shirts was {white_shirts_count} * ${white_shirt_cost} = $<<{white_shirts_count}*{white_shirt_cost}={revenue_white_shirts}>>{revenue_white_shirts}.
The total revenue from all shirts sold was ${revenue_black_shirts} + ${revenue_white_shirts} = $<<{revenue_black_shirts}+{revenue_white_shirts}={total_revenue}>>{total_revenue}.
Tas and his friends ended up making ${total_revenue} / {sale_duration_minutes} minutes = ${money_per_minute} per minute.
